author: dcspark
title: Milkomeda ADA Audit
description: Milkomeda consists of multiple novel un-audited concepts introduced to Cardano written in Rust including multiple open source components.
solution: Audit all components of Milkomeda that are required for the Cardano deployment
experience: Our team is composed of well known ex-Emurgo and ex-IOHK employees who have been building the Cardano ecosystem for the past several years
